hibernate-mapping.query: from EquitySecurityBean as e where e.effectiveDateTime=:effectiveDateTime and e.exchange=:exchange and e.companyName=:companyName and e.currency=:currency

from EquitySecurityBean as e where e.exchange=:exchange and e.companyName=:companyName and e.currency=:currency and e.effectiveDateTime <= :now and not exists (select s.id from EquitySecurityBean as s where s.exchange=:exchange and s.companyName=:companyName and s.currency=:currency and s.effectiveDateTime < :now and s.effectiveDateTime > e.effectiveDateTime and s.id <> e.id)

from EquitySecurityBean as e where e.firstVersion=:firstVersion and e.effectiveDateTime <= :now and not exists (select s.id from EquitySecurityBean as s where s.firstVersion = :firstVersion and s.effectiveDateTime < :now and s.effectiveDateTime > e.effectiveDateTime and s.id <> e.id)

from EquitySecurityBean as e where e.exchange = :exchange and e.companyName = :companyName and e.currency = :currency and e.effectiveDateTime <= :now and e.deleted = false and not exists (select s.id from EquitySecurityBean as s where s.exchange = :exchange and s.companyName = :companyName and s.currency = :currency and s.effectiveDateTime < :now and s.effectiveDateTime > e.effectiveDateTime and s.id <> e.id)

from EquitySecurityBean as e where e.firstVersion=:firstVersion and e.deleted=false and e.effectiveDateTime <= :now and not exists (select s.id from EquitySecurityBean as s where s.firstVersion = :firstVersion and s.deleted = false and s.effectiveDateTime < :now and s.effectiveDateTime > e.effectiveDateTime and s.id <> e.id)
from EquitySecurityBean as e where e.firstVersion = :firstVersion order by e.effectiveDateTime desc
